entry.title: Combined summary - Notifications from client/wallet
entry.summary: The email thread discusses a proposal to add notifications to the client and wallet, allowing for decoupling of UI and core communication. The boost::signal mechanism is proposed as a solution, allowing decoupled delivery of signals from an object. Specific notifications are suggested for the Wallet and Network client, including balanceChanged, transactionAdded, transactionUpdated, transactionRemoved, addressAdded, addressUpdated, addressRemoved, notification, askFee, numConnectionsChanged, numBlocksChanged. The implementation of a central notification interface is also suggested for source cleanup. This would allow for clean separation of pieces and large-scale rewrites without touching anything but the parts being redone. The thread also discusses implementation details and suggestions in detail throughout. Overall, the proposal aims to improve efficiency and functionality within the Bitcoin system.
